titleStmt.title: To the maior, aldermen, and inhabitants of N. That whiche heretofore I haue propounded to you (right worshipfull and beloued) in teaching, I do now publish to all men by printing, to wit, mine opinion of the vnlawfulnesse of games consisting in chance ...
Short and plaine dialogue concerning the unlawfulnes of playing at cards or tables, or any other game consisting in chance
titleStmt.author: Balmford, James, b. 1556.
